news.title: Global CO2 levels hit new record despite pandemic lockdowns
news.summary: Despite the global economic slowdown due to the COVID-19 pandemic, CO2 levels have reached an all-time high, with scientists warning of the need to drastically cut emissions to avoid severe climate impacts.

news.title: European Union to enhance green energy targets
news.summary: The EU has announced plans to increase its green energy targets to 40% by 2030, as part of a broader initiative to reduce greenhouse gas emissions and combat climate change.

news.title: Major climate change laws passed in California
news.summary: California has passed landmark legislation aimed at drastically reducing carbon emissions by 2045, making it one of the most rigorous climate change policies in the United States.

news.title: New study shows Arctic ice melting faster than ever
news.summary: A new report reveals that Arctic ice is melting at a rate faster than previously predicted, raising concerns over rising sea levels and global climate patterns.

news.title: Australia invests in massive reforestation efforts
news.summary: In the face of severe bushfires and climate change threats, Australia has launched a multi-billion dollar project for reforestation to absorb carbon dioxide and protect biodiversity.
